column10: of huntsville passed away saturday after a sudden illness. donald graduated from ensley high school in birmingham and then auburn university in 1959 with a mechanical engineering degree. he retired from teledyne brown in 1994. his hobbies include fishing
column13: and auburn football. donald was a devoted father
column15: and great-grandfather. he was a member of highland baptist church of huntsville
column16: al. he was predeceased by his wife
column17: shirley ingram yeager in 2010. survivors include his son
column30: brayden white of anniston and lawson colvert of madison; sister
column34: tx; and nieces and nephews. visitation will be from 10 to 11am wednesday at laughlin service funeral home. the funeral service will follow at 11:00 a. m. at laughlin service chapel. burial will be in elmwood cemetery
